plugin_desc: The GBase8a-Exporter collects GBase 8a database performance metrics including cache statistics and system resources.
name: GBase8a

metrics.name: up
metrics.description: Indicates whether the Gbase8a-exporter is operating normally. A value of 1 means the exporter is running and able to collect metrics, while 0 indicates it is down or unable to function, serving as a fundamental health check for the monitoring plugin.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_total_dc
metrics.description: The total number of Data Containers (DCs) in the GBase 8a database system. Data Containers are units used for storing data, and this metric reflects the overall quantity of such storage units.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_unlocked_dc
metrics.description: The total number of Data Containers (DCs) that are not locked in the GBase 8a database. Unlocked DCs can be accessed, modified, or moved freely without restrictions from locks.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_total_dc_size
metrics.description: The total memory size occupied by all Data Containers (DCs) in the GBase 8a database. It represents the cumulative memory usage of all DCs in the system.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_unlocked_dc_size
metrics.description: The total memory size occupied by all unlocked Data Containers (DCs) in the GBase 8a database. This reflects the memory consumption of DCs that are available for immediate operation.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_hot_total_dc
metrics.description: The number of Data Containers (DCs) that store hot data in the GBase 8a database. Hot data refers to data that is frequently accessed or updated, and is usually kept in faster storage for quick retrieval.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_hot_unlocked_dc
metrics.display_name: Number of unlocked hot data DCs
metrics.description: The number of unlocked Data Containers (DCs) that store hot data in the GBase 8a database. These DCs hold frequently used data and are not restricted by locks, allowing for efficient access.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_hot_total_dc_size
metrics.display_name: Total memory occupied by hot data DCs
metrics.description: The total memory size occupied by all Data Containers (DCs) that store hot data in the GBase 8a database. It indicates the memory resources allocated to frequently accessed data.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_hot_unlocked_dc_size
metrics.display_name: Memory occupied by unlocked hot data DCs
metrics.description: The total memory size occupied by all unlocked Data Containers (DCs) that store hot data in the GBase 8a database. This metric shows the memory usage of accessible hot data DCs.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_cold_total_dc
metrics.description: The number of Data Containers (DCs) that store cold data in the GBase 8a database. Cold data is infrequently accessed data, often stored in slower storage to save costs.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_cold_unlocked_dc
metrics.display_name: Number of unlocked cold data DCs
metrics.description: The number of unlocked Data Containers (DCs) that store cold data in the GBase 8a database. These DCs hold rarely used data and are not locked, enabling occasional access when needed.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_cold_total_dc_size
metrics.display_name: Total memory occupied by cold data DCs
metrics.description: The total memory size occupied by all Data Containers (DCs) that store cold data in the GBase 8a database. It represents the memory usage of infrequently accessed data storage.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_cold_unlocked_dc_size
metrics.display_name: Memory occupied by unlocked cold data DCs
metrics.description: The total memory size occupied by all unlocked Data Containers (DCs) that store cold data in the GBase 8a database. This reflects the memory consumption of accessible cold data DCs.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_dc_hit_rate
metrics.description: The ratio of successful accesses to Data Containers (DCs) in the GBase 8a database compared to the total number of access attempts. A higher hit rate indicates more efficient data retrieval from DCs.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_heap_size
metrics.description: The total size of the heap memory in the GBase 8a database system. The heap is a region of memory used for dynamic memory allocation during program execution.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_used_in_heap
metrics.description: The size of the heap memory that is currently in use within the GBase 8a database. It shows how much of the total heap is being utilized for active operations.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_used_in_system
metrics.display_name: Additional heap size allocated from the OS
metrics.description: The size of additional heap memory allocated from the operating system by the GBase 8a database. This is extra memory beyond the initial heap allocation to meet increased demand.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_max_used_block
metrics.display_name: Size of the largest block in the current heap
metrics.description: The size of the largest block of memory that is currently in use within the heap of the GBase 8a database. It indicates the biggest contiguous memory chunk being utilized.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_max_free_block
metrics.display_name: Size of the largest free block in the current heap
metrics.description: The size of the largest block of free (unused) memory within the heap of the GBase 8a database. A larger free block suggests more available contiguous memory for future allocations.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_used_blocks
metrics.display_name: Number of used blocks in the heap
metrics.description: The number of memory blocks that are currently in use within the heap of the GBase 8a database. It reflects the fragmentation and utilization pattern of the heap.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_session_current_mem
metrics.display_name: Total memory currently used by sessions
metrics.description: The total amount of memory currently being used by all sessions in the GBase 8a database. Sessions include user connections and their associated operations.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_session_temp_space
metrics.display_name: Total temporary space used by sessions
metrics.description: The total amount of temporary storage space used by all sessions in the GBase 8a database. Temporary space is used for operations like sorting, joining, or temporary table storage.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_sessions
metrics.description: The current number of active session connections in the GBase 8a database. This includes all user and system sessions that are currently connected.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_running_threads
metrics.description: The number of threads that are currently running in the GBase 8a database system. Threads handle various tasks such as query execution, I/O operations, and background processes.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_memory_upper_limit
metrics.description: The maximum amount of memory that the GBase 8a database system is allowed to use. It is a configured limit to prevent excessive memory consumption.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_phsical_memory_usage
metrics.description: The percentage of physical memory that is currently being used by the GBase 8a database system relative to the total available physical memory.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_memory_current_used
metrics.description: The amount of memory that is currently being used by the GBase 8a database system. This includes all memory allocated for various operations and data storage.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_memory_peak_used
metrics.description: The highest amount of memory that has been used by the GBase 8a database system at any point in time. It indicates the maximum memory consumption recorded.

metrics.name: gbase8a_exporter_file_disk_used_size
metrics.display_name: Disk space used by database files
metrics.description: The total disk space used by all database files of the GBase 8a database on the storage system. This includes data files, log files, and configuration files.
